reviews.review_text: Fun spot! Quality beer. Tons of different rotating and main stay beer available. With discounted mix and match in bottles/ cans. They know how to make beer here! Amazing tacos (chicken, pork, veggie) and chips and salsa to go with the delicious flight of beer and fresh corn tacos.  Locally sourced meat from two rivers, just down the street. Chips for salsa from Coquitlam! And Salsa from Jumpin  Johnneys on the North Shore. The tacos are good. The service and friendliness from the staff here is superb, with great knowledge in beer. Patio out front, with easy parking. Just drive down Mountain Highway, with this convenient location. Three different pepperoni sticks available. Impressive package, top notch everything.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sarah, thank you for your kind words! Cheers!

reviews.review_text: A nice tiny place who bring you back in the time of the old cantinas with country music and nice beer, they have a huge selection for any taste and the awesome thing is that you can refill your growler for a few bucks, if you are close from the bridge brewery take your time for visit this small but friendly place and ask for the awards beers that they have
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review! Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: Beer and food was amazing here! Been to many breweries around BC and this place has a great combination of beer and food! Highly recommend visiting here and grabbing a drink!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Eric, Thank you for the 5-star review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time at the brewery! We loved all the photos you shared online! We hope to see you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Great beer, Harry was an amazing host alwho knew everything about the beers and was also a great conversationalist. The blood orange is incredible.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Kevin.  I ll let Harry know how much you enjoyed his service. Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: I LOVE this brewery. The staff is welcoming and very helpful, the beer is AMAZING, and the atmosphere is chill and upbeat. Have to stop here if you appreciate beer when visiting Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great 5 Star review Ben. cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: Next stop on the Craft Brewery tour.....in Vancouver for the next 6 months so why not enjoy the local brews. Great little place to socialize. Tacos are great and the Blood Orange Lager is great
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Alberta.  What brings you to Vancouver for 6 months?  Thanks for the visit.  Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: Got a flight of beers, the waiter was super helpful and accommodating in selecting them - it was great! Really cool place. Totally recommend after a day of skiing or hiking!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review Lennart.  Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: I went there on a Sunday evening. The dude working was really new. If he didnt know something, he got an answer for me. The service was friendly and efficient across the board. Beers are excellent, I especially enjoyed the farmhouse ale. Tap room is small, but thats what I like. They have a small patio with flower boxes that have variety of hops they use growing out of them. You can pick and smell them. The people that patronize the place seem to be regulars and are really friendly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Joe!  Thanks for your review.  Im glad to hear they sought out the answers for you.  Looking forward to seeing you again in the tasting room. Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: Small place with nice beer - I personally only tried low carb but hubby liked many others. Tacos very tasty. Service fast. Space to have a dog which can see u from outside. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star Review Alexandra, glad you liked the PrimeTime. Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Great beer, great food, great service.  If youre in the area definitely go give them a try
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Paul! Thank you for the 5-star review! We are pleased to hear you had a great time at the tasting room! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Wow. Had Primetine tropical. AMAZING!  Husband had BRIDGE IPA. INCREDIBLE.  How have we never stopped in here? Didnt try food, but as it passed looked real tasty. We will be back!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI France! Thank you for the 5-star review!! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our new PrimeTime tropical! We look forward to having you back again for some tacos and more beers! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Great beer and great people with great company. Come by for a flight, or a pint. They have 10 beers on tap in which they rotate every few weeks! Its a cozy space with patio seating as well. Their tacos which are 3 for $12 or 1 for $5 are absolutely amazing. Definitely stop by if you are in the area, or in fact, just come by in general. Their beers and food are bomb!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your review Food Adventures, glad you like the beer and tacos! Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: Very cool atmosphere, nice patio and excellent beer - didn t try any of the food this time but it looks good. Prices are fantastic - you gotta stop in here.
Excellent store we went there last week was good and beer fantastic!! We will go again soon!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there! Thank you for the 5-star review! We would love to hear more about your amazing experience at the brewery! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Love the beer + tacos + space. Also went to two trivia nights, they were well organized and very fun. Please bring back more!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review Alessia.  Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: Best beer in town and a nice place to chill out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Mary. Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: One if the best brewery in BC. Always been a fan, but its been nice to start working close by to be able to go at the brewery. Small local place vibe, friendly staff. The new double IPA currently is awesome. Good tacos for a small snack.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Christophe. Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised to find they had food here. Its not super convenient to walk to but they have 5 or so parking spots. Ive had their beer tons around the city. It was nice to check out their home base. Cons: Definitely haunted.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Josh! Thank you for the 5-star review. We hope that now your know where to find us we will be seeing you again soon for a visit. And haunted..? We would love to hear about this next time! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Great beers, great vibes! Delicious veggie tacos. You can buy quality apparel and beers to go too. Nice patio in the summer that is dog friendly which is perfect post hike or bike.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Charles, Thank you for the 5-star review! We hope to see you again soon for another great experience! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Tasty grog and grub!  Great local spot that gets it right with a simple, good-quality food menu and a broad list of in-house brewed beers.  Perfect stop after a N.Shore ride.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jeffery! Thank you for the 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your visit at the brewery. We look forward to seeing you again for more post-ride beers! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Friendly service. Looked like a nice variety of food and beer at reasonable prices. I tasted a few beers and they were all good. I had a beer battered bacon pastry that was really good too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Robert.  The bacon beer stick is so good, its one of my fav! Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: I really like the beer here and come multiple times per week. I wish that they would bring back the veggie tacos though! The food used to be amazing and now it is subpar and i dont order it anymore. I am offended that the veggie dog has a surcharge when i can buy the same thing at Safeway for $2!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review.  We are looking at our veggie options, hopefully the taco will return soon! Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Always love exploring great locations with my official beer expert, My son. He truly knows dads choices. My selection is on the right...
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Malcolm and glad to hear you and your son had a great time! Always a good choice when it comes to the delicious beer that our brewers are creating! - Phil

reviews.review_text: I am going to some brewings around Vancouver tasting and getting to know a little bit more about the beer culture around here. And Bridge got my heart with the Bourbon and the service. Great people and great beer
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Marcelo! Thank you for the 5-star review! We would love to hear more about your 5-star experience and we are looking forward to seeing again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Best craft beer on the shore, amazing beer and they always have great food to match
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Chris! Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Great place for hanging out and drinking cold beer. 13+ taps and beers to go!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star Review Ben!  Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: I expected a larger tasting room here as I see their beer everywhere. That said, the bartender was very friendly, and the beer was delicious. Small menu of pepperoni sticks and hot dogs with various toppings if youre looking for a snack. Well be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your great review Ariele!  Glad you enjoyed your time with us. Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: Excellent beer, excellent staff, great little patio for a sunny afternoon beer. Winning all around.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review. Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: Friendly, great selection of on tap cold beers and food munching options (tacos!), what else could you ask for? Nice place to relax with some outdoors seating,or to fill up for the weekend from their wide offering of tall cans. But most importantly, the beers taste great!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Talid, Thank you for the amazing review! We are thrilled to hear you had an excellent time at Bridge Brewing! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon! Be sure to check out our new location, the Lonsdale BridgeDeck! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Love the fact that there are new beers every time we go, great that stout back came back for a while and now waiting for the return of 5 oclock somewhere. Their latest 3 goal lead and Shell be right help with the wait. Pulled pork tacos were great this weekend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Derek!  Thanks for the 5 star review.  You never know when some of your favourites will return.  Cheers, Leigh Thank you for the 5-star review! We would love to hear more about your experience. Did you get a chance to try some of our seasonal beers? Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: By far, our favourite brewery on the North Shore (and there are quite a few here now). Been coming here for 5 years and the beer and atmosphere have only gotten better over that time. Food is also solid (tacos are v good) and the vibe is fantastic.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Spencer! Thanks for the awesome review! Its fantastic to hear from returning customers, like yourself! We hope to see you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Very cozy north shore brewery. Always have a great choice of beer, not to mention they have food as well. Would fully recommend any of their staple beers, and prime time beer choices. tasting room staff is super friendly and helpful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the fantastic review Shayan and your recommendations! We look forward to seeing you again soon. - Phil

reviews.review_text: Delicious pork tacos and lots of great beers to try! Highly recommend. Great local gem
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Sacha. Glad you enjoyed the tacos.  Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: Great place to unwind in North Van.  Convenient location. Friendly staff and great brews!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Jon! Hope to see you again soon. Cheers - Phil

reviews.review_text: Super chill, super good beer, always a great variety; those who like to stick to the classics can, and those who like to venture further afield will find some thing to pique their interest. Some tasty snacks as well, and dog friendly to boot. What more could you ask for?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Melanie! Thank you for the amazing review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Brewery! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: My favourite brewery on the north shore.  Awesome IPA s. Nice sunny south facing patio.  Excellent friendly staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review David. Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: We came in after work, having never been here before, looking to try some new beers.  Ive had the Bourbon Blood Orange before, its nice.  This is one of the few places where Ive had a flight, and enjoyed almost all of them.  I highly recommend Bridge brewing, whether your a light beer person, to ales or IPA.  Two flights, 8 beers, all tasty.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star review Ren.  Glad you enjoy all our beers, look forward to seeing you back soon. Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: Love visiting this local craft brewery! Good selection, small homey feel, and food! Their breads are super tasty and the tacos aren t bad either. You really can t go wrong by going there, consistent service and quality! Unfortunately dogs aren t allowed in anymore though.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dana, thanks so much for the review and glad you enjoyed your visit! Yes, unfortunately in order to serve our delicious food we are not able to allow dogs in. We do however have leash ties just outside the patio and a turf area for them to chill in while you enjoy your beer! Cheers, Madelaine

reviews.review_text: This  hole in the wall is magical to me. You are lucky to find a seat AND when you so it is a real joy to sit in here and just be in this place as you drink your beer. My favourite part is that they sell TINY portions on tap should you be 52  and 110 lbs and desire to drink a proportional amount of beer. hahahah. The beers are often funky and flavourful. I have found the people to always be a breath of fresh air to interact with. Thank you BBC.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Christina! Thank you for the awesome 5-star review! Very surprising how often the little tasting glasses are ordered over the regular sizes! We hope to see you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Yuuuuuup! Best brewery on the North shore by a mile. Beer is always fresh with some solid staples on the menu. Also love the intimate tasting room with low ceiling and family style tables. We go at least twice a week for a couple of pints and love it every single time. Decent food options for sharing too. And I saved the best for last, all beers are $5! Exactly the way it should be! So many breweries especially on the n shore are charging waaaay too much. Bridge Brewing 10/10!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jonathan! Thanks for the awesome review! We re glad to hear you are enjoying all aspects of the tasting room experience and of course our beers!Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Great service and boss beers. Thanks to Cali, our server, our birthday group was totally taken care of yesterday. Come to Lonsdale Bridgedeck for chill atmosphere, great beer selection and friendly service. So happy this place is in our neighbourhood.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star Review Jen.  I ll let Kali know you enjoyed the birthday. Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: I come here all the time after mountain biking and love it! The tacos are some of the best in town. 3 for $12 and the pork ones are yumyumyum. The beer is delish and a great spot
reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI Madeleine, Thank for the amazing review! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our tacos and beers! We look forward to seeing you again! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Amazing! My favourite local brewery. Prime Time is the best low cal/carb beer on the BC market. Lots of fun taps to try. The brewery has a great vibe and makes all feel welcome. Cool merch as well!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mike, Thank you for the amazing review! We are thrilled to hear you are enjoying Primetime! We look forward to seeing you again soon for more PrimeTimes! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: The best micro brew in North Van. They were the first to make a light beer taste good (prime time) and even though everyone else is doing now their is still the tastiest. Great tacos too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Grant!  Have you tried the PrimeTime IPA? Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: We stop by every so often and just tried the Double or Nothin - it was probably the best beer we ve had there!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star review! Glad you loved the beer. Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Side Cut is the most incredible beer I ve had in Vancouver (or maybe anywhere). Had to check out the brewery after having one at a restaurant and I m glad I did. Small place, great variety of beer, bread twisted with bacon and cheese. What s not to love? Wonderful place. If I were a local, this would be my brewery.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jennifer! Cheers, Madelaine

reviews.review_text: Love living 200m from here! My wallet doesnt, but my stomach does <3 Best local beer spot I have ever lived by. Look forward to many more pints to come! Very dog friendly. :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Christine! Cheers, Madelaine

reviews.review_text: Had some tacos and the cheese and bacon bread, both were great! Awesome happy hour special starting at 6pm ($4 beers, or 3 tacos and a beer for $12)! Definitely worth checking out :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Alison. Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: Small place but 7 of us went and were very comfortable around one of the larger tables.. Beer is excellent, all of us enjoyed the beer and snacks and food is very good.  Great atmosphere and definitely worth a visit. Go you will enjoy the beer and food.  We will be going back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Happy to hear you enjoyed our tasting room, Peter! Thanks so much for coming in, and for leaving us such a lovely review:) Cheers, Madelaine

reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying Bridge beers on a weekly basis for a couple of years. Recently I was at the brewery and a person ahead of me in line commented that for beer, you can t beat Bridge. I wholeheartedly agreed with him. The All Out Stout is a phenomenal beer, I m glad it is back. The NSP and Bourbon Blood Orange are exceptional. It s worth going back regularly to taste new creations and rediscover old favourites...I ve discovered so many different kinds of beers like Gose and Saison (looking forward to the return of lemon gin). The specialty beers around Christmas are so good, too- I look forward to the Grinch and Santa s Sac. The people are super friendly and always greet you with a smile. Thanks for the sips- keep it up!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your awesome comments and 5 stars! Our brewing team is always striving to bring you new beers while keeping the classics amazing. Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: I was a longtime craft beer drinker until I changed my diet two years ago (no processed sugars and extremely low carb). I went without beer for a long while until I found Bridge Primetime and now Bridge IPA. These low carb beers are now my husbands go to as well. Walking into the brewery and having my first draft poured beer in two years was amazing! Thank you for creating alternatives for all beer lovers!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jacky! Thank you for the great review! We would love to hear more about your 5-star experience and are looking forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Brewers of excellent beer, the Bourbon Blood Orange is a must-try for lovers of wheat ales. The food is also great; the tacos are delicious and complement the selection of  beer perfectly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kevin, Thank you for the 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our Bourbon Blood Orange Wheat Ale (BBO)! Our tacos are prepared by our chefs at the Lonsdale BridgeDeck! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Our favourite local brewery by far! The cozy little room brings about a super local vibe which attracts the right kind of crowd- oh wait- I should mention the beer first because that is by far the best thing about this place! Every brew tastes well made, unique, and powerfully delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: What a lovely review, thank you so much Haylee! We aim for cozy:) Cheers! Madelaine

reviews.review_text: This place is popular for a reason. They were one of the first breweries on the North Shore and their success really showed when they had to move to a bigger premises to expand their operations. Youll find 6-10 different beers available for growler fills, and perhaps some special batches in glasses. Its a nice place to go, friendly staff and plenty of products available for everyone. A perfect stop on your way home.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Henry, always a pleasure to see you here!

reviews.review_text: This place is such a hidden gem. Great food and great drinks.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank for the review. cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: The beer is delicious!! The Bourbon Blood Orange is a standout and one of my favs.  If youre heading to the brewery - try the tacos so tasty and worth the trip.
Frikin awesome! Love this place. If it had more food options, i would be there every day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers Keith!

reviews.review_text: Just had a dozen Kolsch delivered to my home.  Fast service and a totally excellent beer!!!  I spent two weeks in Germany in April 2019 and your Kolsch matches or beats any of the beers I had there. Great job Bridge!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Scott! Thank you for the awesome review! We are thrilled to hear you are enjoying our Wunderbar Kolsch! Cheers,

reviews.review_text: Although the tasting room is a little small and cramped, their beers are really good. The staples are all well rounded and flavorful and they frequently put out interesting and tasty beers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Derek.  We wish our tasting room was larger too! Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: Wonderful staff, and well crafted beer attract wonderful people who enjoy drinking a cold one. Always a lovely experience and you really cant go wrong.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mandy, Thanks so much for the review! What is your favourite brew? Cheers, Maria

reviews.review_text: Favorite place for stopping by after a hike in the North Shore. Also my favorite IPA around the Lower Mainland. And the vibe is great.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review

reviews.review_text: Nice brewery on a quiet street.  Did a small beer flight,  all of which were great.  The head brewer walked my group and I through the tasting.  He was both knowledgeable and friendly.  There is also a small cafe where you can drink a pint or get a small snack.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers Justin!

reviews.review_text: Best brewery on the North Shore hands down and its not even a close race.  The limited edition Bootable Offense IPA was to die for! - bought a stash which is starting to run out now.  Can you guys source some more Aussie hops? Keep up the great work!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andrew! Glad to hear that you enjoyed our Bootable Offense! Maybe we will see it return to our set of limited release beers! Thanks for the support and the great review. We hope to see you at the brewery soon. Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: such a fun place and the beer is awesome. Tuesday Trivia night was so much fun (props to the staff for making it so entertaining!), but I was so bummed to hear that it doesnt run through the summer :(... isnt the summer the best time for trivia?? long days, hot weather, extra space on the patio?! pls bring it back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review Olivia!  We wish we could run Trivia all summer too, however the tasting room is simply too busy on Tuesday nights in the summer. Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: Quaint little hole in the wall serving up awesome in house brews. If you show up on a sunny Saturday don t expect to walk in without a wait, but it is worth it. Incredible staff, even better beer and a fun atmosphere.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great comments! Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: Love the beer here, and tacos are also delicious. Staffs are friendly, and I love the little patio area to chill. Just make sure you park at the right parking spot without getting fined.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Kelly! I ll let the staff and chef know how much you enjoy your visits.  Yes, the district will ticket you if you park in the middle of the road   Cheer Leigh

reviews.review_text: The kindest and most amazing staff out of all breweries I ve visited in Vancouver! And of course really delicious beer and tacos as well! A brewery other breweries should look up to! Well done!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Malgorzata, Thank you for this amazing review! We are thrilled to hear that your experience with the Bridge Brewing Team has been a memorable one. We hope to see you again very soon for more tacos, beers and good times! Cheers,

reviews.review_text: One of my regular places for growler fills.. Great range of beers to suite any taste..my favorites include blood orange wheat ale and side cut IPA..they have a very limited menu but tacos were surprisingly good.. Lots of opportunity for growth beyond beer..
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Thomas! Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Best brewery on the North Shore in my opinion. Great selection on tap that rotated regularly, friendly staff, and an awesome atmosphere. Do yourself a favour and stop by for a beer or five when you re in the area.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jason, Thank you for the 5-star Review! What was your favourite beer that you enjoyed? We hope to see you again soon! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: Went there on a quiet Monday noontime. Service was excellent, beer was better yet and excellent soft shell tacos.  Im surmising that on busy nights theres gonna be lineups and parking issues so check this place out at off peak hours.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Cheers, thanks for the review! We really appreciate it.

reviews.review_text: Tried a flight in their tasting room. They have a nice selection of beers here. The north shore IPA is a favourite of mine, as is the all-out stout. Worth a visit if youre in the area.

I happened to get a bottle of bridge brewing s golden strong ale (Santa sac) as gift. Turned out to be the best golden ale I ve even had: even it s 10% acohol it s still very smooth with citrus favor. Can wait to visit the actual tasting room!
Bridge brewing is a North Shore classic. Casual & comfortable tasting room, come for the great beer, stay for the tacos and awesome people. The squash sour we tried today was 10/10.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the awesome review Ben! Glad you enjoyed the new brew! Cheers, Madelaine

reviews.review_text: Great beer! Love the blood orange and the lemon gin saison! Awesome spot and great helpful staff ....just what we need here in North in! If you havent checked it out yet get down there!

Nice brewery with a small tasting room and smaller patio. A larger than normal selection of beers on tap. The selection is a little heavy toward IPAs; Although the hopilano is a unique high hop flavour with low bitterness. Would like to see a dark/brown lager
Best North Shore brewery! Constantly releasing new beers, fair prices and also good tacos. Serve beers in flights, sleeves and pints. Growlers to take home. Cheers
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 Star review Marin! Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Great atmosphere in a small tasting room, delicious food (GET THE TACOS!) and the beers are great. Try the Hakuna Horchata blonde ale while its still here - SO GOOD.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Margarita, thanks for the 5 star review!  Glad you loved the tacos. Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Easy growler fills. Great beer, I recommend the Bourbon Blood Orange Wheat Ale. Cant wait to try others
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chris, Thanks so much for the 5 star review! Cheers, Maria

reviews.review_text: This is the first place I went to when I first moved to BC, absolutely love it. Great beer, Great staff and Great food. Thanks for all memories!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mon! Thank you for the 5-star review! We are honored to be the first stop when you came to BC. We look forward to having you stop by again! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: On the smaller side - but luckily we went on a rainy Sunday that wasnt super busy. The beers were great and the merchandise I found to be super decently priced. Will definitely be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for stopping by and for the lovely review Melissa! Glad you enjoyed and hope to see you again! Cheers, Madelaine

reviews.review_text: Super chill place. I would recommend you try the bacon or asparagus cheese bread! Great beer too! Definitely will be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star review.  Glad you like the beer sticks! Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: Prime time - no compromises, is my favourite brew and much appreciate the refund deposits on the beer toppers! It really does pay to drink ;)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Riley! Were so glad you enjoy PrimeTime! Have you had the change to try the IPA or Tropical? Here at Bridge we are all about sustainability and try our best to recycle what we can, so having this incentive to bring back our toppers is definitely a win-win for both of us! Cheers, Maria

reviews.review_text: Possibly the best beer in Vancouver. We loved going here but sadly it is only take out now. Hoping to return to their patios when the lockdowns are over!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ayesha, thanks for the 5 Star Review! I m not sure what you are referring to  only take out  we have plenty of socially distanced tables and our patio is open Year round. Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Best damn brewery on the North Shore!
The best brewery in the city. Amazing quality of beer, amazing selection and the staff are super friendly and fun. Always a hopping place with a great atmosphere.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Mike! Always glad to see you at the brewery enjoying your Wunderbar Kilsch and Bourbon Blood Orange. Cheers

reviews.review_text: This place is tucked away in North Van, but do what google suggests and follow google here.  Great food.  Awesome beer.  Best place for an apres-ride snack.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the rating, Ken! Cheers, Madelaine

reviews.review_text: you cannot go wrong with the bridge. yummy beer and food. great patio and atmosphere
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your great review Oscar.  Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Excellent place, great beers and food options are good. Bridge Deck has really good burgers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review! What is your favourite Bridge brew? -Maria

reviews.review_text: Love this North Van staple with their regular and rotating selection!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your 5 star review Erin. Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: Best beer on the North Shore! Love their selections, and if you eat in, the tacos are excellent
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Amelia! Thanks for the review! Glad you enjoyed our tacos, we sure do! Cheers, Katrina

reviews.review_text: This place knocked it out of the park! Visiting from Ottawa and trying to get to as many of the Vancouver breweries as we can, this one is the best that we have been to both food and beer!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the amazing review Bradley and glad to hear you had a great time! Hope to see you again on your next visit. Cheers - Phil

reviews.review_text: The Best brewery around. The most consistent beers, and even the flavours I wouldnt normally go for taste good to me. And the tacos.... The. Tacos.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Rob.  Glad you love the tacos too!  Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Great beer, great tacos, awesome prices all wrapped up in a chill out of the way atmosphere!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 star review Koops!  Glad you like the beer and tacos. Cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Great beer and food. Get the local street corn dog and the bourbon blood orange
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you like the hot dog. cheers, Leigh

reviews.review_text: Great beer, great atmosphere. Samir is the best! Definitely recommend this brewery.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Samir is the best! Thanks for the 5 star review, Alexa :) -Maria

reviews.review_text: Great beer selection, nice bustling atmosphere, decent tacos and friendly staff. Thoroughly recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your great review Mark! What was your favourite beer? Cheers Leigh

reviews.review_text: I was a bit disappointed that I couldn t fill a growler to go but  Tall Handsome Blue Hoody  was a great host,DJ,bartender,chef,etc.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stephen, sorry to hear you couldnt get a growler fill, not sure what happened there? If you would like to send me an email Id love to coordinate getting you that growler fill. phil@bridgebrewing.com. Glad to hear the staff member made sure you had a great time otherwise. - Phil

reviews.review_text: Beer is GREAT, especially if you like a citra finish. Beauty pale ale, kolsch is friends favorite. Maybe an occasional visit by a food truck?
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 Star review Steve.  Glad you like the Pale Ale.  Thanks for the suggestion of the Food Truck. Cheers, Leigh.

reviews.review_text: The beer is pretty good, the food is pretty great, but the service is an absolute 10/10.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ryan! Thank you for the 5-star review! Wed love to hear more about your experience! did you have a chance to try some of our seasonals? Cheers! Katrina

reviews.review_text: Very good beer and tacos.   My favorite is the blood orange beer.   I usually go to this place after biking mt Fromme.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Adam!
